title: Search Analytics and Optimization
content:
# Search Analytics and Optimization

## Key Metrics

### Query Performance
- Total searches: 500K/day
- Avg response time: 85ms
- p95 latency: 150ms
- p99 latency: 300ms

### User Behavior
- Avg searches per session: 2.3
- Click-through rate: 42%
- Zero-result rate: 8%
- Refinement rate: 35%

### Popular Searches
Top 10 updated hourly:
1. "iPhone"
2. "laptop"
3. "headphones"
...

## Optimization Strategies

### Query Analysis
Monitor for:
- High-volume zero-result queries
- Slow queries (>500ms)
- High bounce rate queries
- Spelling variations

### A/B Testing
Current tests:
- Relevance algorithm v2
- Filter UI layout
- Suggestion count (5 vs 10)

### Synonym Management
Add synonyms based on:
- User query patterns
- Zero-result searches
- Product attributes

### Result Ranking
Signals used:
- Text relevance: 40%
- Popularity: 25%
- Conversion rate: 20%
- Recency: 10%
- Inventory: 5%

## Search Quality

### Manual Review
Weekly spot checks:
- Top 100 queries
- Random sample of 50
- Zero-result queries

### Automated Tests
- Regression tests for key queries
- Performance benchmarks
- Relevance scoring

## Reporting
- Daily search quality report
- Weekly optimization recommendations
- Monthly trend analysis

## Tools
- Kibana for log analysis
- Grafana for metrics
- Custom search quality dashboard
